How to use

First things first, thank you for downloading this app! Some tips:

• The keyboard opens at startup. You can change this behavior in the menu
• Add an item: input your text then select the priority
• Remove an item: Long press on it, or use the menu.
• Edit an item: long press (remove) it to copy the text on the input area, edit it and select the priority to add it as a new item
• You can use symbols instead of the color code (see the menu)
• You can change the font size from the menu

Icon

The Sleek TODO icon is kindly provided by http://www.doublejdesign.co.uk
Add an item: just start typing and select the priority
Remove this item (long press on it)
The text of any removed item is copied back in the input text area. Clear it using the button or edit it and add it again.
Open the menu, remove everything and start todo\'ing
